title: Community Livestream - v.249 Update Preview
content: Join Community Managers Veeraah and Jade in the next Community Livestream as they preview the upcoming events and contents in v.249 Minar Picnic.

title: v.249 - Minar Picnic Update Preview
content: What better way to welcome the Spring season than with a wonderful picnic in the Minar Forest!

title: Cash Shop Update for March 13
content: St. Patrick's Day Surprise Style Box, St. Patrick's Day Equip Covers, and more!

title: [Completed] Unscheduled Maintenance - March 11, 2024
content: The unscheduled maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 3 hours. Thank you for your patience.

title: [Completed] Unscheduled Maintenance - March 8th, 2024
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 2 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: MapleStory X KONOSUBA Cash Shop Update for March 6
content: MapleStory X KONOSUBA items in the Gachapon Update and Hat Surprise Style Box!
